A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All the men (including Luke) in this movie are wimps or idiots until they get a \"slap\" from a woman\, and all the women are perfect saints. The Luke story is total BS. it would never happen. He spent the original trilogy trying to SAVE Darth Vader because he felt a tiny bit of good in him\, and now he considers killing Ben Solo because he thought he 'might' turn evil? A shame to treat Luke's character this way.
